patthana23.21:1.1: Navipākaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā vipākadhammadhammo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.21:2.1: Navipākaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā vipākadhammadhammo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.21:3.1: Navipākaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
